GULP

Breathe in that fresh country air



Location

Our air is farmed from the finest pockets within the Peak District, specifically Hope Valley. The valley is famous for attracting tourists from all over the world. It's also notorious for attracting London second-homers like a rat to a twix bar. If that doesn't tell you this air has magical properties, nothing will.

Sustainability

We have rigorously tested our products for sustainability. Extensive studies have shown that our methodology to capture and farm air has no effect on the environment whatsoever. In fact someone (not us) could argue that our distribution model helps the environment through a process known as air spreading. All our air is 100% recyclable, as is our beautiful glass storage system.

Value

Can you put a value on your health and the air you breathe? It turns out you can. See below for our price list.

£100

Medium

£150

Large
